mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of chigger mites (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) of Southeast Asia

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Euschoengastia kohlsi : Wharton & Fuller 1952: 78
;
Radford 1954: 265
, fig. 95.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type deposition.
H. kohlsi : USNM
;
H. hongkongensis : SAM.

Type data.
H. kohlsi
: ex
Rattus tanezumi
(syn.
Rattus mindanensis mindanensis
), Philippines , Mindoro Is., San Jose;
H. hongkongensis
: ex
Rattus rattus
, China , Hong Kong , The Peak, 563 Middle Gap Road.

Hosts. RODENTIA :
Apodemus chevrieri , Bandicota bengalensis , B. indica , Berylmys berdmorei , B. manipulus , Callosciurus erythraeus , Cremnomys cutchicus , Diomys crumpi , Funambulus pennantii , Hadromys humei , Leopoldamys edwardsi , Madromys blanfordi , Melomys cervinipes , Menetes berdmorei , Mus booduga booduga , M. musculus , M. musculus domesticus , M. platythrix , Nesokia
sp.,
Niviventer cremoriventer , Rattus andamanensis , R. exulans , R. leucopus , R. nitidus , R. norvegicus , R. rattus , R. tanezumi
; SORICOMORPHA :
Anourosorex squamipes , Suncus murinus , S. stoliczkanus
; SCANDENTIA :
Tupaia glis
; CARNIVORA :
Prionailurus bengalensis , Viverricula indica
; ARTIODACTYLA :
Muntiacus muntjak
; DIPROTODONTIA :
Macropus agilis
; PRIMATES :
Homo sapiens , Macaca mulatta
; SQUAMATA :
Hemidactylus frenatus
; AVES :
Gallus gallus , Geokichla citrina , Turnix tanki
.
Distribution. Australia , Burma , China , India , Iran , Nepal , Pakistan , Philippines , Taiwan , Thailand , Vietnam .
